input:
Hoffenheim 1 - 1 Dortmund

First Half:

10:11 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
10:19 Event: Foul by Dortmund
10:32 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
10:55 Caption: Hoffenheim control the tempo of the game by exchanging some accurate short passes.
11:11 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
11:34 Caption: Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) commits an ugly tackle on his opponent, but there is no caution from the referee.
11:45 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
12:02 Event: Ball out of play
12:21 Caption: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Dortmund will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
12:29 Event: Corner by Dortmund
12:33 Event: Ball out of play
12:38 Caption: The resulting corner, taken by Jakub Blaszczykowski (Dortmund), comes to nothing.
12:45 Event: Clearance by Hoffenheim
13:33 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
13:37 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
13:43 Event: Ball out of play
13:57 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
14:06 Event: Ball out of play
14:12 Caption: Anthony Modeste (Hoffenheim) wastes a good opportunity as his pass into the box is blocked by the defence. The ball is out of play. Hoffenheim will have a chance to score from a corner.
14:16 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
14:31 Event: Ball out of play
15:00 Event: Corner by Hoffenheim
15:02 Event: Shots on target by Hoffenheim
15:29 Caption: Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) takes the corner, but one of the defenders reacts well and rises highest to head the ball away.
15:40 Event: Ball out of play
15:55 Event: Clearance by Dortmund
16:15 Event: Ball out of play
16:22 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
16:36 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
17:14 Event: Direct free-kick by Dortmund
17:17 Event: Foul by Dortmund
17:20 Caption: Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) jumps into a tackle and Jochen Drees blows his whistle for a foul. Dortmund win a free kick.
17:34 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
17:38 Caption: Marcel Schmelzer (Dortmund) attempts to find one of his teammates with a ball from a free kick outside the box. The goalkeeper climbs high above all the players in the box to intercept the cross and snuff out the opportunity.
18:07 Event: Ball out of play
18:24 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
18:51 Event: Shots on target by Hoffenheim
18:54 Event: Ball out of play
19:06 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
19:14 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
19:20 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
19:24 Caption: Roberto Firmino (Hoffenheim) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.
19:35 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
19:48 Caption: Jochen Drees blows his whistle for a foul after Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) hacks down one of his opponents. A free kick to Dortmund.
20:10 Caption: Jakub Blaszczykowski (Dortmund) swings in a promising cross from the free kick, but one of the defenders does a perfect job to avert the danger.
20:13 Event: Direct free-kick by Dortmund
20:26 Event: Ball out of play
20:41 Caption: Kevin Volland (Hoffenheim) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge. The ball goes out of play. Hoffenheim are awarded a corner kick.
21:01 Event: Corner by Hoffenheim
21:14 Caption: Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) sends the corner into the box, but Mitchell Langerak intercepts it and averts the threat.
21:18 Event: Ball out of play
21:27 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
21:37 Event: Ball out of play
21:47 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
22:22 Event: Shots on target by Dortmund
22:25 Caption: Neven Subotic (Dortmund) produces a dangerous lofted cross into the box which is intercepted.
22:42 Caption: Ilkay Gundogan (Dortmund) collects a pass and has an effort from distance which is blocked.
22:54 Event: Foul by Dortmund
23:08 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
23:09 Caption: Jochen Drees has a clear sight and sees a foul from Sebastian Kehl (Dortmund). Hoffenheim have a free kick.
23:20 Event: Shots on target by Hoffenheim
23:26 Caption: Eugen Polanski (Hoffenheim) has an effort from distance but it's blocked.
24:26 Event: Offside by Dortmund
24:39 Caption: Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) is adjudged to have been offside when making his run.
24:53 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
25:16 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
25:23 Event: Yellow card by Hoffenheim
25:43 Caption: Roberto Firmino (Hoffenheim) makes a slide tackle, but referee Jochen Drees blows for a foul.
25:54 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
25:55 Caption: The foul by Roberto Firmino (Hoffenheim) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Jochen Drees.
26:15 Event: Ball out of play
26:20 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
27:05 Event: Offside by Dortmund
27:23 Caption: Flag up against Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund). He had space to move into behind the defence, but he went too soon.
27:25 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
27:41 Event: Ball out of play
27:52 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
28:03 Event: Ball out of play
28:17 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
28:29 Event: Ball out of play
28:37 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
28:52 Caption: A pass by Jakub Blaszczykowski (Dortmund) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.
29:37 Event: Ball out of play
29:52 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
30:11 Event: Shots off target by Hoffenheim
30:12 Event: Ball out of play
30:17 Caption: Kevin Volland (Hoffenheim) received a pass and didn't think long what to do with it. He fired a powerful long-range shot which went painfully close to the right post.
30:32 Event: Clearance by Dortmund
30:52 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
31:05 Caption: Eugen Polanski (Hoffenheim) didn't hesitate to knock his opponent down with a harsh sliding tackle. Jochen Drees could probably show him a yellow, but he only goes with blowing the whistle for a foul. Dortmund are awarded a free kick.
31:24 Caption: Ilkay Gundogan (Dortmund) takes the resulting free kick from outside the box. He sends a nice cross into the box, but his intention is well anticipated by the goalkeeper who comes out to collect the ball.
31:32 Event: Direct free-kick by Dortmund
31:53 Event: Foul by Dortmund
32:02 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
32:12 Caption: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) commits a foul after bringing down his opponent with a slide tackle.
32:17 Caption: And it's a goal by Kevin Volland (Hoffenheim)! He picked the ball up inside the box and drilled a low shot inside the left post.
32:21 Event: Ball out of play
32:26 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
32:38 Event: Shots on target by Hoffenheim
32:38 Event: Goal by Hoffenheim
33:28 Event: Kick-off by Dortmund
34:15 Caption: Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) fails to find any of his teammates inside the box as his pass is blocked. Dortmund force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.
34:19 Event: Ball out of play
34:20 Caption: The referee awards a corner and Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) goes over to take it.
34:33 Caption: Mats Hummels (Dortmund) meets the corner and displays his eye for goal as he coolly plants a header from close range into the right side of the goal. The score is 1:1.
34:39 Event: Corner by Dortmund
34:40 Event: Shots on target by Dortmund
34:41 Event: Goal by Dortmund
35:31 Event: Kick-off by Hoffenheim
35:38 Event: Foul by Dortmund
35:56 Event: Direct free-kick by Hoffenheim
35:57 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
36:01 Caption: Flag goes up against Anthony Modeste (Hoffenheim) and the referee blows his whistle for offside.
36:10 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
36:51 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
37:17 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
37:37 Event: Ball out of play
38:47 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
38:51 Caption: Jakub Blaszczykowski (Dortmund) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.
39:33 Caption: A cross from Anthony Modeste (Hoffenheim) fails to reach the box as the defence clears the ball away to safety.
40:15 Event: Ball out of play
40:26 Event: Substitution by Dortmund
40:38 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
40:40 Caption: Jakub Blaszczykowski is substituted due to injury. Jurgen Klopp gives a chance to Kevin Kampl (Dortmund).
40:58 Caption: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) is unable to feed a through ball into the path of his teammates.
41:34 Event: Ball out of play
41:38 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
41:53 Event: Shots off target by Hoffenheim
41:54 Event: Ball out of play
42:05 Caption: Anthony Modeste (Hoffenheim) goes close to scoring with a shot from inside the box, but he drags his effort wide of the right post.
42:22 Event: Clearance by Dortmund
42:49 Event: Ball out of play
43:05 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
44:01 Event: Foul by Dortmund
44:04 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
44:15 Caption: Kevin Kampl (Dortmund) pulls the jersey of one of the opposition players and Jochen Drees blows his whistle for a foul.
44:35 Event: Ball out of play
44:37 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
44:39 Caption: Anthony Modeste (Hoffenheim) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
45:11 Caption: That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
45:59 Caption: If the players are going to continue with the trend set in the opening 45 minutes, we can expect a decline in the number of visitors to future matches. So far the game has been rather unattractive. Both teams are unsuccessfully trying to control the game and it's pretty even so far. Both teams are attempting to play possession football.

Second Half:
00:00 Event: Kick-off by Hoffenheim
00:01 Caption: Referee Jochen Drees blows his whistle to start the second half.
00:06 Event: Ball out of play
00:24 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
00:40 Event: Shots off target by Hoffenheim
00:41 Event: Ball out of play
01:02 Event: Clearance by Dortmund
01:15 Caption: Kevin Volland (Hoffenheim) makes a yard for himself and goes for goal from long range. It never troubles the goalkeeper as it flies well wide of the right post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Dortmund.
01:18 Event: Shots off target by Dortmund
01:19 Event: Ball out of play
01:33 Caption: Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) receives a well-played pass inside the penalty area and shoots. His effort sails well wide of the left post.
01:45 Event: Clearance by Hoffenheim
01:56 Event: Foul by Dortmund
02:04 Event: Yellow card by Dortmund
02:10 Caption: Sebastian Kehl (Dortmund) tackles a bit over-zealously and Jochen Drees blows for a foul. Hoffenheim get a free kick.
02:14 Caption: Jochen Drees shows the yellow card to Sebastian Kehl (Dortmund) for a heavy challenge.
02:31 Event: Direct free-kick by Hoffenheim
02:42 Caption: Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) delivers a poor cross from a free kick as one of the defenders comfortably clears it away.
02:46 Event: Offside by Dortmund
02:53 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
02:55 Caption: Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) finds himself beyond the last defender, but the game is stopped by the referee after the linesman signals for offside.
03:11 Event: Ball out of play
03:33 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
04:04 Caption: A cross into the box from Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) is cleared.
04:36 Caption: Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) sends a cross into the box, but the opposition's defence quickly intercepts the ball.
05:04 Event: Ball out of play
05:12 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
05:34 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
05:34 Caption: Kevin Volland (Hoffenheim) sends a long ball in, but Mitchell Langerak comfortably gathers the ball.
05:38 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
05:43 Event: Ball out of play
05:53 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
06:13 Caption: Anthony Modeste (Hoffenheim) tries to send the ball in front of the goal, but the opposition's defence averts the threat.
06:58 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
07:01 Caption: A pass by Adam Szalai (Hoffenheim) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.
07:21 Caption: Referee Jochen Drees sees the trip by Jeremy Toljan (Hoffenheim) and doesn't hesitate to blow his whistle.
07:37 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
07:53 Event: Ball out of play
08:02 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
08:42 Event: Ball out of play
09:05 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
09:29 Event: Ball out of play
09:36 Caption: Kevin Kampl (Dortmund) sees a yellow card. He should be more careful because one more challenge like that could result in a red card.
09:58 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
10:06 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
10:21 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
10:25 Event: Ball out of play
10:29 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
10:41 Event: Ball out of play
10:56 Caption: Kevin Kampl (Dortmund) whips the ball into the penalty area, but one of the defenders is alert and spanks it away. Dortmund force a corner. They send men into the box.
11:03 Event: Corner by Dortmund
11:08 Caption: Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) takes the corner kick but the ball only finds the head of an opponent.
12:10 Caption: Henrikh Mkhitaryan received a sweet pass from Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund), but the advance is stopped.
12:12 Event: Shots off target by Hoffenheim
12:13 Event: Ball out of play
12:13 Caption: Anthony Modeste (Hoffenheim) makes a yard for himself inside the box after an accurate pass and takes a shot that goes just wide of the right post.
12:36 Event: Clearance by Dortmund
12:50 Event: Foul by Dortmund
13:03 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
13:23 Event: Foul by Dortmund
13:40 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
13:43 Event: Foul by Dortmund
13:57 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
14:08 Event: Shots on target by Hoffenheim
14:16 Caption: Adam Szalai (Hoffenheim) connected with a pass around the edge of the box, aimed and shot. His attempt went towards the middle of the target, but Mitchell Langerak was alert and the score remains the same.
14:56 Event: Ball out of play
15:00 Caption: Anthony Modeste (Hoffenheim) has a shot blocked from inside the box. The referee blows his whistle, Hoffenheim are awarded a corner kick.
15:16 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
15:32 Event: Shots on target by Hoffenheim
15:32 Event: Ball out of play
16:07 Event: Corner by Hoffenheim
16:10 Event: Ball out of play
16:28 Event: Corner by Hoffenheim
16:30 Event: Shots on target by Hoffenheim
16:54 Caption: The resulting corner from Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) is cleared by the defence. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Hoffenheim.
17:05 Caption: Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) goes over to take a corner kick after one of the defenders makes a good clearance.
17:23 Event: Ball out of play
17:40 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
17:47 Caption: A cross arrives in the goalmouth from the resulting corner kick. Ermin Bicakcic (Hoffenheim) outjumps the defence, but his promising header bounces away off the bar!
17:52 Event: Ball out of play
18:05 Event: Clearance by Hoffenheim
18:25 Event: Shots off target by Dortmund
18:27 Event: Ball out of play
18:33 Caption: Close! Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) picks up the ball in space and from inside the penalty area sends a shot inches wide of the right post.
18:56 Event: Clearance by Hoffenheim
19:01 Event: Ball out of play
19:08 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
19:14 Event: Ball out of play
19:21 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
19:28 Event: Ball out of play
19:50 Event: Clearance by Dortmund
20:09 Event: Ball out of play
20:17 Caption: Anthony Modeste (Hoffenheim) sends a long ball across the pitch, but it misses its target. The ball goes out of play and Dortmund will have a goal kick.
20:37 Event: Clearance by Dortmund
20:51 Event: Offside by Dortmund
21:00 Caption: Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) is offside and the linesman raises his flag.
21:14 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
21:46 Event: Ball out of play
21:51 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
21:55 Event: Ball out of play
22:09 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
22:53 Caption: Kevin Volland (Hoffenheim) breaks past challenges inside the box, but puts too much pace on his pass to Jeremy Toljan.
23:01 Event: Ball out of play
23:07 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
23:21 Event: Ball out of play
23:44 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
23:56 Event: Foul by Dortmund
24:10 Caption: Adam Szalai (Hoffenheim) fails to beat the offside trap and the linesman puts his flag up.
24:15 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
24:20 Event: Ball out of play
24:23 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
24:42 Event: Offside by Hoffenheim
25:00 Caption: Adam Szalai (Hoffenheim) is caught offside!
25:17 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
25:31 Event: Ball out of play
25:36 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
25:51 Event: Foul by Dortmund
26:13 Event: Yellow card by Dortmund
26:20 Caption: Jochen Drees interrupts the game for a tactical foul by Erik Durm (Dortmund). It's a free kick to Hoffenheim in a dangerous position.
26:31 Event: Direct free-kick by Hoffenheim
26:31 Caption: Erik Durm (Dortmund) is awarded a yellow card. The referee showed him no mercy.
27:11 Caption: Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) takes the free kick but it is cleared by the first defender.
27:37 Event: Foul by Dortmund
28:09 Event: Substitution by Dortmund
28:18 Caption: It's time for a substitution. Ciro Immobile (Dortmund) comes on in place of Shinji Kagawa.
28:19 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
28:24 Event: Shots off target by Hoffenheim
28:25 Event: Ball out of play
28:31 Caption: Anthony Modeste (Hoffenheim) holds his head in his hands after wasting a promising chance. He latches onto a rebound, creates some space for himself and fires the ball from the edge of the box into the stands.
29:17 Caption: Markus Gisdol has decided to substitute Anthony Modeste and he is replaced by Sven Schipplock (Hoffenheim).
29:19 Event: Substitution by Hoffenheim
29:25 Event: Clearance by Dortmund
29:33 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
29:40 Caption: The referee blows his whistle after Andreas Beck (Hoffenheim) does a good impression of a basketball player and handles the ball.
29:56 Event: Indirect free-kick by Dortmund
30:39 Caption: Roberto Firmino (Hoffenheim) and Sven Schipplock try to prise open the opposition with a series of short passes, but one of the defenders steps in and puts an end to the move.
30:44 Event: Offside by Dortmund
31:06 Caption: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) is flagged for offside.
31:07 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
31:15 Event: Ball out of play
31:21 Caption: Sven Schipplock (Hoffenheim) produces a lovely ball into the penalty area but the defender manages to intercept and comfortably averts the danger. The ball is out of play. Hoffenheim will take a throw-in.
31:27 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
31:35 Event: Ball out of play
31:58 Caption: Jeremy Toljan (Hoffenheim) attempts to find some of his teammates with a dangerous pass from the edge of the box. The opponent's defence, however, intercepts the effort and clears the ball to safety. Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner kick.
31:59 Event: Corner by Hoffenheim
32:03 Event: Shots off target by Hoffenheim
32:06 Event: Ball out of play
32:18 Caption: Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) takes the corner with a short pass.
32:20 Event: Corner by Hoffenheim
32:25 Event: Shots off target by Hoffenheim
32:37 Event: Ball out of play
32:37 Caption: Jeremy Toljan (Hoffenheim) creates a yard of space for himself and tries an effort from distance, but it's blocked. The ball goes out of play. Hoffenheim are awarded a corner kick.
32:55 Caption: Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) looks like he will be the one to try and deliver a quality ball into the penalty box from the corner kick.
32:58 Event: Corner by Hoffenheim
33:16 Event: Offside by Dortmund
33:37 Caption: Sven Schipplock (Hoffenheim) sends a beautiful cross into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence manages to clear the ball to safety. Hoffenheim get a corner.
33:54 Caption: Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) sends in a poor cross from the corner and Mitchell Langerak has no trouble gathering it.
34:08 Caption: Ciro Immobile (Dortmund) is adjudged offside.
34:42 Caption: David Abraham (Hoffenheim) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.
35:40 Event: Substitution by Hoffenheim
35:49 Caption: Markus Gisdol is forced to make a change. David Abraham is unable to continue due to injury, Jin-Su Kim (Hoffenheim) comes on.
35:52 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
36:02 Event: Foul by Dortmund
36:24 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
36:40 Event: Ball out of play
36:43 Caption: Hoffenheim move the ball around well as they wait for an opportunity to shoot, but the attack is halted as they lose possession.
36:46 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
36:50 Event: Ball out of play
36:53 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
37:04 Event: Foul by Dortmund
37:29 Caption: The game is interrupted now, Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.
38:16 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
38:21 Event: Ball out of play
38:24 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
38:40 Event: Shots on target by Dortmund
39:05 Caption: Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) has picked up a minor injury, but it looks like he will be able to continue.
39:06 Event: Foul by Dortmund
39:12 Caption: It's unbelievable, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) blows a huge opportunity! He has a lot of space around him and fires a terrific daisy-cutter from point blank range. His first-time effort is directed towards the middle of the target, but Oliver Baumann reacts superbly to keep the ball out.
39:15 Caption: Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) reacts well to get to the rebound and takes a shot from the edge of the box, but he fails to get the ball through the players standing between him and the goal.
39:39 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
39:53 Event: Ball out of play
40:08 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
40:25 Event: Ball out of play
40:34 Event: Throw-in by Hoffenheim
40:44 Event: Foul by Dortmund
41:05 Event: Direct free-kick by Hoffenheim
41:19 Event: Ball out of play
41:45 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
41:55 Event: Shots on target by Dortmund
41:58 Event: Ball out of play
42:01 Caption: Ciro Immobile (Dortmund) collects a great pass inside the box and misses a golden opportunity. His low shot was directed into the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper does well to stop his effort.
42:07 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
42:37 Event: Ball out of play
42:56 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
43:13 Event: Ball out of play
43:20 Caption: A lofted cross from Sebastian Kehl (Dortmund) is unsuccessful as the opponent's defence quickly clears the ball out of the penalty area. Good work from Dortmund as they win a corner.
43:32 Event: Corner by Dortmund
43:45 Caption: The resulting corner comes to nothing as Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) sends it out of play.
44:30 Event: Shots on target by Dortmund
44:32 Event: Ball out of play
44:37 Caption: Ilkay Gundogan (Dortmund) collects a pass inside the box and unleashes a shot which is brilliantly blocked by a defender. Now Dortmund have a corner.
44:53 Event: Corner by Dortmund
44:56 Event: Foul by Dortmund
45:03 Caption: Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) is heading toward the corner flag to take the set piece.
45:19 Caption: Mats Hummels (Dortmund) gets on the ball and beats an opponent, but his run is stopped by the referee Jochen Drees who sees an offensive foul.
45:26 Event: Substitution by Hoffenheim
45:40 Event: Indirect free-kick by Hoffenheim
45:40 Caption: Substitution. Pirmin Schwegler makes way for Sejad Salihovic (Hoffenheim).
45:54 Event: Ball out of play
46:00 Event: Throw-in by Dortmund
46:10 Event: Foul by Hoffenheim
46:48 Caption: Ilkay Gundogan (Dortmund) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
47:27 Caption: The linesman raises his flag. Kevin Volland (Hoffenheim) is adjudged offside.
47:50 Caption: Great touch by Ciro Immobile (Dortmund) as he receives a precise pass deep inside the box and rips a shot goalwards, but the keeper pulls off an amazing save!
47:59 Caption: The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.
48:59 Caption: The fans could demand a bit more entertainment for their money. This game was average. There wasn't any significant dominance by either side in this game. Both sides tried to combine well and to keep the ball at their feet.
    

    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
The match between Hoffenheim and Borussia Dortmund ended in a 1-1 draw, a largely competitive game marked by continuous possession battles and several key moments. The first half commenced at a crisp pace, initiated by a kick-off from Dortmund. Within seconds, the ball was out of play, setting a precedent for a half riddled with out-of-play instances and throw-ins. Dortmund started off with most of the possession, but Hoffenheim showed their mettle soon after with a series of attacks.

Hoffenheim had their first notable event in the third minute with a shot on target, exerting early pressure on Dortmund's defense. Dortmund responded with their own organized play, and indirect free-kicks were exchanged between the two teams. The initial tense tempo saw a series of fouls predominantly committed by Hoffenheim, although Dortmund also contributed to the physicality. Several times, Pirmin Schwegler of Hoffenheim showcased a particularly aggressive style, resulting in free-kicks awarded to Dortmund.

Dortmund's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang tried a solo run at the 12-minute mark, leading to a corner kick in their favor. Although the subsequent corner taken by Jakub Blaszczykowski yielded no fruitful results for Dortmund, it was evident that both teams were trying to break each other's defense through set-pieces and rapid counters.

Hoffenheim wasted a good opportunity in the 14th minute when Anthony Modeste's pass into the box was efficiently blocked by the Dortmund defense, leading to another corner for Hoffenheim. Despite the corner efforts, Hoffenheim's attacks were frequently intercepted by Dortmund's vigilant defense, exemplified by a crucial clearance by one of their defenders post a well-taken corner by Schwegler.

Efforts on goal by both sides were continuous though not overwhelmingly successful; Hoffenheim saw their shots off target countered by Dortmund's precise defensive clearances. Amid these exchanges, Hoffenheim succeeded in controlling the tempo through accurate short passes, maintaining the ball in tight spaces before more fouls led to frequent pauses in the game as Dortmund's defense worked hard to disrupt their rhythm.

By the 17th minute, Schwegler once again plunged into a rough tackle, winning yet another free-kick for Hoffenheim. As the game progressed, the hard tackles did not go unnoticed by the referee, who showed a yellow card to Schwegler for his unsportsmanlike conduct. Dortmund remained composed and focused on crafting their strategy, leveraging indirect free-kicks to set up attacking plays.

The first half saw Hoffenheim scoring the opening goal through Kevin Volland’s clinical finish after receiving the ball inside the box. His shot drilled past Dortmund’s defense and landed inside the left post, placing Hoffenheim ahead at 32 minutes. However, their lead was short-lived as Dortmund responded almost immediately. Within two minutes, Dortmund equalized through a beautifully executed header by Mats Hummels, who met Henrikh Mkhitaryan’s corner with precision. The crowd witnessed an electrifying shift in momentum as both sides returned to an even playing field.

The game’s intensity only increased, with tactical fouls from both sides leading to further free-kicks and interceptions. Substitutions followed, notably Blaszczykowski's replacement by Kevin Kampl due to injury. The first half concluded with teams locked at 1-1, robots to tit-for-tat play which signified a balanced contest unfolding at the Rhein-Neckar-Arena.

As the second half kicked off, both teams aimed to capitalize on the few chances they created. The early moments of the half featured rapid switches of possession and several shots off target from both sides. Hoffenheim, eager to regain the lead, exerted pressure, but Kevin Volland's long-range shot flew wide of Dortmund’s goal, reaffirming the evenly poised nature of the game.

Dortmund faced their own adversities, as their midfielder Sebastian Kehl was shown a yellow card after a zealous tackle. Despite some poor crosses from Hoffenheim's Schwegler, which were easily cleared by Dortmund’s defense, the game advanced with sporadic flashes of attacking brilliance. Notably, Hoffenheim’s Adam Szalai connected well with a pass around the box but was denied by a vigilant Mitchell Langerak in goal for Dortmund.

Continuous exchanges of possession followed, with the game temporarily halted to attend to an injured Kevin Kampl from Dortmund, further intensifying the stop-start nature of the play. The tactical fouling and aggressive play continued, with Hoffenheim committing several fouls, leading to Dortmund having more set-piece opportunities. Another burst of action came when Aubameyang's shot from inside the penalty area flew just wide of the right post, missing by mere inches.

As the match clock ticked on, opportunities arose but were often squandered. Substitutions on both sides aimed at injecting fresh energy into the teams but bore no substantial impact on the scoreline. Markus Gisdol substituted Anthony Modeste with Sven Schipplock for Hoffenheim, while Jurgen Klopp brought on Ciro Immobile for Dortmund. Despite several promising advances and relentless work from both teams, defenders stood strong, particularly impressed was how Dortmund's backline restricted Hoffenheim’s further scoring attempts.

By now, exhaustion was clear on both sides with multiple players requiring medical attention. The game’s rhythm fractured into intermittent attacks and counterattacks, often immediately quashed by disciplined defensive efforts. Hoffenheim’s successive corner attempts late in the game, particularly taken by Schwegler, spotlighted their persistence. However, notable misses like Jeremy Toljan's far-post shot underscore Hoffenheim's failure to capitalize fully on created chances.

Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang’s missed opportunity late into the match highlighted Dortmund’s struggles equally. A promising daisy-cutter shot from him was met with an equally commendable save from Hoffenheim’s keeper, Oliver Baumann. The final minutes saw end-to-end action, with both teams having chances to clinch a late winner. Henrikh Mkhitaryan's cleared cross from the edge of the box and Mats Hummels’ offensive foul halted Dortmund's flow as they pushed to seal the deal.

In the end, despite their best efforts, both teams had to settle for a draw after regulation time. The fans witnessed an engaged though not overly thrilling contest, leaving with expectations slightly dulled by the lack of a definitive victor. Both teams showcased their defensive prowess and ability to pressurize opponents, ensuring the points were split at each half's conclusion.
